description: Deploy an instant Single Page Application (SPA) by pasting HTML, hosted automatically in IBM Cloud Object Storage.

inputs.name: ibmcloud_api_key
inputs.description: Your IBM Cloud API key to deploy resources.

inputs.name: location
inputs.description: The IBM Cloud location for the COS bucket (e.g., us-south, eu-de).
